entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Blainville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
